name: Touhou project:Magical Dinner below the full moon Redditaisai Edition
name_original: Touhou project:Magical Dinner below the full moon Redditaisai Edition
description:
under the light of a glorious full moon, the mistress of the scarlet devil mansion has decided to try out a special recipe that can only be seen once by its user, will her servant, Sakuya, the perfect maid,  be up to the task?

-hello there, this is a special Edition of Magical Dinner below the full Moon, a game made for the fabulous touhou fan game jam number 2.

https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-2

you can play the original here: 

https://itch.io/jam/touhou-jam-2/rate/279683

this version has new content, updated graphics, improved music, new sound effects and mechanics,and soul crushing bugs fixed, and its intended to be released for the Redditaisai 2018

links here:

http://www.redditaisai.com/

https://www.reddit.com/r/touhou/comments/7koyh9/redditaisai_2018_information_and...

you can take a look at the original soundtrack of the game right here :

https://jcamilo.bandcamp.com/album/magical-dinner-celebration-below-the-full-moo...

hope you enjoy the game!

pd: some small bugs might still be lurking in the shadows there , but i like how the game is at  this point, flandre included.

Made by:

-White Pikmin

-Dedalocious

-J' Camilo

special thanks to noiter00123 who helped by making the game's cover and several other graphics on the game , such as UI elements and the like.
